mapper.select: select ai_prescription_id, ai_prescription_key, ai_prescription_time, ai_prescription_creator, ai_prescription_modify_time, ai_prescription_modify_employee, ai_prescription_content from ai_prescription
mapper.insert: insert into ai_prescription(ai_prescription_key, ai_prescription_time, ai_prescription_creator, ai_prescription_modify_time, ai_prescription_modify_employee, ai_prescription_content) values (#{aiPrescriptionKey}, #{aiPrescriptionTime}, #{aiPrescriptionCreator}, #{aiPrescriptionModifyTime}, #{aiPrescriptionModifyEmployee}, #{aiPrescriptionContent})
mapper.update:
update ai_prescription
ai_prescription_key = #{aiPrescriptionKey},
ai_prescription_time = #{aiPrescriptionTime},
ai_prescription_creator = #{aiPrescriptionCreator},
ai_prescription_modify_time = #{aiPrescriptionModifyTime},
ai_prescription_modify_employee = #{aiPrescriptionModifyEmployee},
ai_prescription_content = #{aiPrescriptionContent},
where ai_prescription_id = #{aiPrescriptionId}
